decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (EX00, Design and Access Statement - Received 01/05/2018. Construction Management Statement - Received 08/05/2018. EX01 Rev A, EX02 Rev A, EX03 Rev A, EX04 Rev A, EX05 Rev A, EX06 Rev A, EX07 Rev A, EX08 Rev A, EX09 Rev A, EX10 Rev A, P02 Rev A, P03 Rev A, P04 Rev B, P05 Rev B, P06 Rev B, P07 Rev B, P08 Rev A, P09 Rev A, P10 Rev B. P11 Rev A - Received 28/06/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 7 - The roof lights shall be 'conservation style', installed to be flush with the existing roof slope.

Condition : 8 - No excavation or construction work shall be undertaken prior to the submission and approval in writing by the Local Planning Authority, of a Construction Method Statement, which is certified by a qualified professional giving details of excavation, temporary works and construction techniques, including details of potential impacts on neighbouring land based on assessment of the geology and hydrology of the area. The basement extension should be carried in accordance with the details approved.
Condition : 9 - The basement shall at no time be used or occupied as a separate dwelling independent of the main house and shall not be used as sleeping accommodation.

Condition : 10 - No development shall be carried out until such time as the person carrying out the work is a member of the Considerate Constructors Scheme and its code of practice, and the details of the membership and contact details are clearly displayed on the site so that they can be easily read by members of the public.
description: Erection of a rear roof extension and a front roof light, a single storey rear extension, enlargement of the basement with a front light well, a side extension to create a cycle-store, and a bin-store to the front of the property.
